sample: 99.5 mass %;0.01 water mass %(dried in a desiccator;dried by vacuum heating)
components.name: 1-butyl-3-methylimidazolium hexafluorophosphate

ref.title: Volumetric, ultrasonic and spectroscopic studies of molecular interactions in binary mixtures of 1-butyl-3-methylimidazolium hexafluorophosphate with 2-propoxyethanol at temperatures from 298.15 to 323.15 K
ref.full: Krishna, T. S.; Raju, K. T. S. S.; Gowrisankar, M.; Nain, A. K.; Munibhadrayya, B. (2016) J. Mol. Liq. 216, 484-495.
